|  --- | --- | --- |

|  [loc](./shader-ast.symopts.loc.md) | <code>number</code> | Layout location |
|  [num](./shader-ast.symopts.num.md) | <code>number</code> | Arrays only. Length |

|  [q](./shader-ast.symopts.q.md) | <code>SymQualifier</code> | If in global scope, used for:<!-- -->- <code>in</code> =<!-- -->&gt; attribute (in VS), varying (in FS) - <code>out</code> =<!-- -->&gt; varying (in VS), output (in FS)<!-- -->For parameters / fn args:<!-- -->- <code>in</code> =<!-- -->&gt; passed into a function - <code>out</code> =<!-- -->&gt; passed back out of a function, but not initialized - <code>inout</code> =<!-- -->&gt; passed both into and out of a function |
|  [type](./shader-ast.symopts.type.md) | <code>SymType</code> | Symbol type, only used for global scope in/out vars, e.g. attribute, varying, uniform. |
